sentence.Network_en: Now look yonder, just beyond the wooden post there.
sentence.Network_cn: 看那边，就在木头柱子的旁边。

sentence.Network_en: His wife, Claudia, lies under yonder tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的妻子，克劳迪娅，躺在那边那棵树下。
我们在那边的树下休息吧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... yoke 轭 yonder 那边 you 你;你们.
以y开头的形容词,急急急急！_百度知道 ... yellowish 淡黄色的 yonder 那边的 young 年轻的.
Shelly to Elizabeth Hitchener ... monopolize 独占，垄断 yonder 那边的，远处的 conjecture 推测，臆测.
在那边在远处副词 adv.1.在那边在远处Yonder stands an oak. yore 英j :j   美j.

list.abs: do you see yonder clump of trees ., 你看见那边的一丛树林了吗.
He has walked to yonder hill ., 他已步行去那边的小山.
nightly she sings on yonder pomegranate trees .每天晚上，她会在这里的石榴树上歌唱。
He lives in yonder cottage ., 他住在那边的小屋里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: of Germanic origin; related to Dutch ginder 'over there', also to yon

entry.tran: （over there的过时或方言用语）那里，那边
entry.def: Yonder is an old-fashioned or dialect word for 'over there'.

example.ex: Now look yonder, just beyond the wooden post there.
example.tran: 看那边，就在木头柱子的旁边。

means.word_mean: 1. distant but within sight (`yon' is dialectal);
1. at or in an indicated (usually distant) place (`yon' is archaic and dialectal);

auth_sentence.content: I found it in the clump of trees yonder.
